text: Hello All! I’m looking to translate some Fortran code that uses `namelist` and `.nl` files to specify I/O for NetCDF files.  I haven’t been able to find much as to the ‘best practice’ in accomplishing this in Julia. (Any good examples of Julia applications, especially ones using NetCDF files would be appreciated.) Would the Julia equivalent to `.nl`  be `.toml` files, and to use `TOML.parse()`  in the top level program?
